channel.title: Shops currency

item.title: Shops currency
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

Ok so im making a shop with tokkul but it says I dont have enough tokkul when in my invy i have more then i would need?

if (MyShopID == 36) { if (playerItemsN[Slot2] >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { deleteItem(6529, GetItemSlot(6529), TotPrice2); addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough Tokkul for this item."); }
